message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $16000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm thinking $14500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'm thinking $12500. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12500. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm thinking $14000. This is my last offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further.
